name: Force Impact
description:
Many countries on earth do peace agreements between them. Trade, travel, or friendship between countries occurs among these inhabitants. Until a nuclear explosion occurred in country X, as a result the superpower lost its power.

A communist organization of scientists and soldiers from all over the country who are foolish in understanding the meaning of justice named International Justice Scientists and Soldier (IJSS) became the mastermind behind the nuclear explosion in country X.

Justice Scientists also launched troops by air to each of the islands on earth. Many countries including major countries are experiencing a downturn due to a lack of capability in dealing with the effects of nuclear explosions and surprise attacks from Justice Scientists. In the midst of the global crisis, the Government of Y countries created a special unit to prevent and stop the actions of IJSS to protect the Y country and the rest of the world.
